text: Obajana is a town in Kogi State, Nigeria. It is located in the Oworo district of Lokoja LGA, Kogi state. == Industry == It is the site of the largest cement plant in Africa owned by Dangcem. == Transport == In 2014, a feasibility study for a railway line to serve this town was commenced. == See also == * Railway stations in Nigeria * Cement in Africa == References == Category:Populated places in Kogi State
title: Obajana
